law.catch_line: The Governor shall submit to the General Assembly by the third Wednesday in January each year, excep...
law.text: The Governor shall submit to the General Assembly by the third Wednesday in January each year, except in the case of a newly elected Governor, and then not later than 10 days after the convening of the General Assembly, each bond or revenue bill necessary to submit a balanced budget and to carry out the proposed budget for the next fiscal year.
